text: Die Mutter is an East German film. It was released in 1958. It is an adaptation of a play by Bertolt Brecht, which in itself is based on a novel by Maxim Gorky. ==External links== * Category:1958 films Category:East German films Category:Films based on works by Bertolt Brecht Category:Films based on works by Maxim Gorky Category:German-language films Category:Filmed stage productions
title: Die Mutter
